ci_support_win_64_python3.10.____cpython:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
readline:
- '8'
target_platform:
- win-64
zip_keys:
- - python
  - channel_sources

about.description:
The pyreadline package is a python implementation of GNU readline functionality
it is based on the ctypes based UNC readline package by Gary Bishop. It is not
complete. It has been tested for use with windows 2000 and windows xp.
about.summary: A python implmementation of GNU readline.

name: pyreadline
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pyreadline" %}
{% set version = "2.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "4530592fc2e85b25b1a9f79664433da09237c1a270e4d78ea5aa3a2c7229e2d1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.zip
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.zip
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}
  patches:
    - 0001-import-from-collections.abc.patch


build:
  number: 1009
  skip: True  # [not win]
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - pyreadline
    - pyreadline.clipboard
    - pyreadline.console
    - pyreadline.keysyms
    - pyreadline.lineeditor
    - pyreadline.modes

about:
  home: http://ipython.org/pyreadline
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: doc/COPYING

  summary: 'A python implmementation of GNU readline.'
  description: |
    The pyreadline package is a python implementation of GNU readline functionality
    it is based on the ctypes based UNC readline package by Gary Bishop. It is not
    complete. It has been tested for use with windows 2000 and windows xp.

  doc_url: http://pythonhosted.org/pyreadline/
  dev_url: https://github.com/pyreadline/pyreadline

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - astaric

about.description:
The pyreadline package is a python implementation of GNU readline functionality
it is based on the ctypes based UNC readline package by Gary Bishop. It is not
complete. It has been tested for use with windows 2000 and windows xp.
about.summary: A python implmementation of GNU readline.
